text:
A devotee should commence this austerity by observing a fast on the eleventh day of the bright half of the hindu month-bhadrapad and break it on the following day-dwadashi.
He should worship lord Kalki with appropriate rituals.
As per the norms of the rituals,the idol of lord Kalki is placed on a pot which is filled with water.
This idol is donated to a learned brahmin on the following day- trayodashi.
title: Kalki-Dvadashi Vrata
